original: bi sh'a pi krishna mu kha s'a dha nam /
analyzed: bi sh'a pi krishna mu kha s'a dha nam /

original: sha za kha nag ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sha za kha nag ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The means of achieving the flesh-eating Kṛṣṇāmukhi

original: aom ta ti le ta ti le krishna mu khe ma h'a pi sh'a tsi de hi da d'a hi sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ta ti le ta ti le krishna mu khe ma h'a pi sh'a tsi de hi da d'a hi sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tati le tati le kṛṣṇāmukhe mahāpiśācī dehi dāḍhahi svāhā.

original: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te /
analyzed: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te /
translated: Recite this one hundred thousand times.

original: de nas tshes bcu bzhi nas zan lhag ma'i chad bu la sngags lan bdun bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du spyin no //
analyzed: de nas tshes bcu bzhi nas zan lhag ma'i chad bu la sngags lan bdun bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du spyin no //
translated: Then, from the fourteenth day, give the leftovers of one's food, to which the mantra has been recited seven times, for one month.

original: nam phyed la bzlas pa mang du bya /
analyzed: nam phyed la bzlas pa mang du bya /

original: de nas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo thog thag bzlas pa bya /
analyzed: de nas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo thog thag bzlas pa bya /
translated: Then, on the fourteenth night, recite continuously.

original: nam phyed dam yang na tho rangs ka 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: nam phyed dam yang na tho rangs ka 'grub par byed do //
translated: At midnight or at dawn, one will accomplish.

original: nyi ma re re di na ra bcu bcu ster ro //
analyzed: nyi ma re re di na ra bcu bcu ster ro //
translated: Every day, one will receive ten dinars.

original: 'dre mo kha nag ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'dre mo kha nag ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The means of achieving the demoness Kṛṣṇāmukhī is complete.
